about_the_game:
TanLing Notes - LingTan Xiaoyi Summer Night Costume (with 29999 soul coins attached) DLC includes Discovery Xiaoyi Summer Night Costume, with 29999 soul coins attached to the skin.



"Peach blossoms fade away in summer, butterflies turn golden pink with red colour."

Late summer night, is attractive pink, rhythmic rhythm mixed with the laughter of the crowd, eliminating the summer mattress and exhaustion!
